question.text: Read the following statements and choose the incorrect statement.

options.text: Mango tree do not and cannot grow in tropical countries like Canada and Germany
Snow leopards are not found in Kerala forests
Tuna fish are rarely caught beyond tropical latitudes in the ocean.

Both  <math><mfenced separators="|"><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">A</mi></mrow></mfenced><mo> </mo><mo> </mo><mi mathvariant="normal">a</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">n</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">d</mi><mo> </mo><mo> </mo><mfenced separators="|"><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi></mrow></mfenced></math>  are correct

solution.text: Every organisms have ability to adapt with organisms and every organisms can grow optimally in suitable environment or habitat. Like for growth of mango trees comparatively high temperature is required which can be available in tropical regions. Canada and Germany are included in a temperate region where higher temperature can not be obtained.
